verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> a servant <WG1401> of God, <WG2316> and an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> according <WG2596> to the faith <WG4102> of God's <WG2316> elect, <WG1588> and the acknowledging <WG1922> of the truth <WG225> which <WG3588> is after <WG2596> godliness; <WG2150>
In hope <WG1680> of eternal <WG166> life, <WG2222> which <WG3739> God, <WG2316> that cannot <WG893> lie, <WG893> promised <WG1861> before <WG4253> the world <WG166> began; <WG4253>

But has in due <WG2398> times <WG5550> manifested <WG5319> his word <WG3056> through <WG1722> preaching, <WG2782> which <WG3739> is committed <WG4100> to me according <WG2596> to the commandment <WG2003> of God <WG2316> our Savior; <WG4990>

To Titus, <WG5103> my own <WG1103> son <WG5043> after <WG2596> the common <WG2839> faith: <WG4102> Grace, <WG5485> mercy, <WG1656> and peace, <WG1515> from God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our Savior. <WG4990>

For this <WG5127> cause <WG5484> left <WG2641> I you in Crete, <WG2914> that you should set <WG1930> in order <WG1930> the things that are wanting, <WG3007> and ordain <WG2525> elders <WG4245> in every <WG2596> city, <WG4172> as I had appointed <WG1299> you:

If <WG1487> any <WG1536> be blameless, <WG410> the husband <WG435> of one <WG3391> wife, <WG1135> having <WG2192> faithful <WG4103> children <WG5043> not accused <WG1722> <WG2724> of riot <WG810> or <WG2228> unruly. <WG506>

For a bishop <WG1985> must <WG1163> be blameless, <WG410> as the steward <WG3622> of God; <WG2316> not self-willed, <WG829> not soon <WG3711> angry, <WG3711> not given <WG3943> to wine, <WG3943> no <WG3361> striker, <WG4131> not given to filthy <WG150> lucre; <WG146>
But a lover <WG5382> of hospitality, <WG5382> a lover <WG5358> of good <WG5358> men, sober, <WG4998> just, <WG1342> holy, <WG3741> temperate; <WG1468>

Holding <WG472> fast <WG472> the faithful <WG4103> word <WG3056> as he has been taught, <WG1322> that he may be able <WG1415> by sound <WG5198> doctrine <WG1319> both <WG2532> to exhort <WG3870> and to convince <WG1651> the disputers. <WG483>
For there are many <WG4183> unruly <WG506> and vain <WG3151> talkers <WG3151> and deceivers, <WG5423> specially <WG3122> they of the circumcision: <WG4061>

Whose <WG3739> mouths <WG1993> must <WG1163> be stopped, <WG1993> who <WG3748> subvert <WG396> whole <WG3650> houses, <WG3624> teaching <WG1321> things which <WG3739> they ought <WG1163> not, for filthy <WG150> lucre's <WG2771> sake.

One <WG5100> of themselves, <WG846> even a prophet <WG4396> of their own, <WG2398> said, <WG2036> The Cretians <WG2912> are always <WG104> liars, <WG5583> evil <WG2556> beasts, <WG2342> slow <WG692> bellies. <WG1064>
This <WG3778> witness <WG3141> is true. <WG227> Why <WG1223> <WG3739> rebuke <WG1651> them sharply, <WG664> that they may be sound <WG5198> in the faith; <WG4102>
Not giving heed <WG4337> to Jewish <WG2451> fables, <WG3454> and commandments <WG1785> of men, <WG444> that turn <WG654> from the truth. <WG225>

To the pure <WG2513> all <WG3956> things are pure: <WG2513> but to them that are defiled <WG3392> and unbelieving <WG571> is nothing <WG3762> pure; <WG2513> but even <WG2532> their mind <WG3563> and conscience <WG4893> is defiled. <WG3392>

They profess <WG3670> that they know <WG1492> God; <WG2316> but in works <WG2041> they deny <WG720> him, being <WG5607> abominable, <WG947> and disobedient, <WG545> and to every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041> reprobate. <WG96>
